publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4788♦ Linda Fabiani: Sconestone—That the Parliament welcomes the initiation of the First Keeper of the Sconestone, the Reverend Neil Galbraith, and the historic associations that the Sconestone has with the ancient traditions and symbols of Scotland; congratulates Hunter Primary School in East Kilbride on entering into the spirit of the ethos of the stone by creating a kindness tree to mark the day, 4 September 2009, when the school hosted the Sconestone prior to its travels around the globe to promote kindness to others as a value that Scots seek to uphold, and congratulates sculptor Warren MacLeod on his design, inspired by ancient Scottish orbs first used by the Scots’ earliest ancestors, and the concept of using Scottish symbolism and values to stimulate acts of kindness in people around the world. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S3M-4788♦ Sconestone (lodged on 7 September 2009) Rob Gibson*, Alasdair Allan*, Christina McKelvie*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*
S3M-4788 Sconestone (lodged on 7 September 2009) Christine Grahame*, Jamie Hepburn*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Bill Kidd*, Sandra White*, Michael Matheson*
S3M-4788# Sconestone (lodged on 7 September 2009) Gil Paterson*, Aileen Campbell*

S3M-4788# Linda Fabiani: Sconestone—That the Parliament welcomes the initiation of the First Keeper of the Sconestone, the Reverend Neil Galbraith, and the historic associations that the Sconestone has with the ancient traditions and symbols of Scotland; congratulates Hunter Primary School in East Kilbride on entering into the spirit of the ethos of the stone by creating a kindness tree to mark the day, 4 September 2009, when the school hosted the Sconestone prior to its travels around the globe to promote kindness to others as a value that Scots seek to uphold, and congratulates sculptor Warren MacLeod on his design, inspired by ancient Scottish orbs first used by the Scots’ earliest ancestors, and the concept of using Scottish symbolism and values to stimulate acts of kindness in people around the world. Supported by: Rob Gibson, Alasdair Allan, Christina McKelvie, Shirley-Anne Somerville, Christine Grahame, Jamie Hepburn, Hugh O’Donnell, Bill Kidd, Sandra White, Michael Matheson, Gil Paterson, Aileen Campbell
S3M-4788# Sconestone (lodged on 7 September 2009) Willie Coffey*
S3M-4788# Sconestone (lodged on 7 September 2009) Pauline McNeill*

S3M-4788# Sconestone (lodged on 7 September 2009) Angela Constance*, Stuart McMillan*, Bob Doris*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Kenneth Gibson*, Christopher Harvie*, Robin Harper* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
S3M-4788# Sconestone (lodged on 7 September 2009) Trish Godman* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
S3M-4788# Sconestone (lodged on 7 September 2009) Maureen Watt*
S3M-4788# Sconestone (lodged on 7 September 2009) Dave Thompson*
S3M-4788# Sconestone (lodged on 7 September 2009) Anne McLaughlin* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
